Nerangs.ab: frā.tē staōmaide ahurāne ahurahe vaŋhīš yasnąsca vahmąsca hubəraitīšca ušta.bəraitīšca vaṇta.bəraitīšca yazatanąm abar āb ϑβā andar wardēnišn aṣ̌aōnąm pādyāb andar hilišn kuxšnaēša purr bē kunišn us.bī.barāmi az āb ul dārišn raϑβasca bərəzatō andar rāh-ē gāϑā̊sca srāuuaiiōit̰ ān gyāg bē nihēd

"(He should recite) above the water: frā.tē staōmaide ahurāne ahurahe vaŋhīš yasnąsca vahmąsca hubəraitīšca ušta.bəraitīšca vaṇta.bəraitīšca yazatanąm. At ϑβā he should turn the cups. At aṣ̌aōnąm he should fill them with a little consecrated water. At kuxšnaēša he should fill them completely. At us.bī.barāmi he should lift them out of the water. (He recites) raϑβasca bərəzatō on the way and gāϑā̊sca srāuuaiiōit̰ there (where) he put them down."

pas frā.tē staomaide tā yazatanąm θβā harw dō ǰām andar wardišn ašaonąm pādyāb andak-ēw andar kunišn kuxšnūša purr bē kunišn usbī.barāmi az āb ul dārišn raθβasca bərəzatō andar rāh-ēw gāθā̊sca srāuuaiiōit̰ ān gyāg kē abar hāwan bē nihēd kē dō-mardīh kār framāyēnd ā-šān ēk az did wāz gīrišn raθβasca bərəzatō *ōh gōwišn kē bē barēd tā az sē gām ī āb bē šawišn hamē ka a-pādyāb bē bawēd u-š frā.tə̄ staomide abāz gōwišn ka az sē gām ī āb bē šawišn ā-š wāz abāz gīrišn

"Afterwards, (he should recite frā.tē staomaide up to yazatanąm θβā and he should turn the cups. At ašaonąm he has to pour a driblet of pādyāb. At kuxšnūša he should fill them completely. At usbī.barāmi he should lift them out of the water. (He should recite) raθβasca bərəzatō on the way and gāθā̊sca srāuuaiiōit̰ there, where he would put them on the hāwan. If they order that it is a job for two persons, then they should take the wāz one from the other and recite raθβasca bərəzatō. The one who brings them, until he goes three steps away from water, if something becomes impure, he has to recite again frā.tə̄ staomide. When he has gone three steps way from the water, he has to take again the wāz."

frā.tē staōmaiδe ahurāne ahurahe vaŋhīš yasnąsca vahmąsca hubərətīsca uštā.bərətīsca vaṇta.bərətīsca yazatanąm ϑβā aṣ̌aōnąm kuxšnīša āb andar sokure-ye do tā porr kardan us.bībarāma se bār sokure andar bālā va šib āvardan pas raϑβasca bərəzatō gāϑā̊sca srāuuaiiōit̰ sokure andar ruy-e sang-e urwis nahādan

"frā.tē staōmaiδe ahurāne ahurahe vaŋhīš yasnąsca vahmąsca hubərətīsca uštā.bərətīsca vaṇta.bərətīsca yazatanąm ϑβā aṣ̌aōnąm kuxšnīša. He should fill the two cups with water. At us.bībarāma he should move the cups up and down three times and then at raϑβasca bərəzatō gāϑā̊sca srāuuaiiōit̰ he should put them on the surface of the stone urwis."

frā.tē staōmaiδe ahurāne ahurahe vaŋhuš yasnąsca vahmąsca hubərətīsca uštā.bərətīsca vaṇta.bərətīsca yazatanąm avar āb ϑβā āb ke dar bon-e zurdān bāšad riḫtan aṣ̌aōnąm pādyāv andar dārešn kuxňīša zurdān porr-e āb kardan usbī.barāmi aǧ āb ul dārešn raϑβaēca bərəzatō andar rāhi gāϑā̊sca srāuuaiiōit̰ ānǧā-i nahešn

"frā.tē staōmaiδe ahurāne ahurahe vaŋhuš yasnąsca vahmąsca hubərətīsca uštā.bərətīsca vaṇta.bərətīsca yazatanąm -over the water- . At ϑβā he should pour the water that might be in the bottom of the zurdān. At aṣ̌aōnąm, he should hold it in pādyāv. At kuxšnīša, he should fill the zurdān with water. At usbī.barāmi, he should take (the zurdān) out of the water. (He should recite) raϑβaēca bərəzatō on the way and at gāϑā̊sca srāuuaiiōit̰ he should put it there (on the urwisgāh)."

frātē staomaede ahurāne ahurahe vaŋhə̄uš ẏas ną̇sca vahmą̇sca hubərətīmca uštabərətīmca vaṇtanə rətīmca ẏazataną̇m ϑβā avar āv vardešn aṣ̌aoną̇m pādyāv andaki andar konešn kuxšnīṣ̌a por bekonešn usbī barāmī az āv dārešn raϑβasca bərəzatō andar rāh gāϑā̊sca srāuuaiiōit̰ pa ǧāy nahešn

"frātē staomaede ahurāne ahurahe vaŋhə̄uš ẏas ną̇sca vahmą̇sca hubərətīmca uštabərətīmca vaṇtanə rətīmca ẏazataną̇m. At ϑβā., he should turn it towars the water. At aṣ̌aoną̇m, he should pour inside a driblet of pādyāv. At kuxňīša, he should fill it. At usbi barāmi, he has to take it out of the water (and recite) raϑβasca bərəzatō in the way. At gāϑā̊sca srāuuaiiōit̰, he has to place it (on the urvis)."

Quotations.ab: frātə̄ staōmaide ahurāne ahurahe vaŋhə̄uš yasnąsca vahmąsca hubərətīšca ušta.bərətīšca vaṇta.bərətīšca yazatanąm abar āb ϑβā andar wardēnnišn aṣ̌aōnąm pādyāb andak-ē andar kunišn kuxšnūša purr bē kunišn usbībarāmi az āb ul dārišn raϑβasca bərəzatō andar rāh-ē gāϑā̊sca srāuuaiiōit̰ ān gyāg kē bē nihēd

"(He should recite) above the water: frātə̄ staōmaide ahurāne ahurahe vaŋhə̄uš yasnąsca vahmąsca hubərətīšca ušta.bərətīšca vaṇta.bərətīšca yazatanąm. At ϑβā he should turn the cups face down. At aṣ̌aōnąm he should fill them with a little consecrated water. At kuxšnūša he should fill them completely. At usbībarāmi he should lift them fully out of the water. (He recites) raϑβasca bərəzatō on the way and gāϑā̊sca srāuuaiiōit̰ at the place where he put them down."
